buy 3 eligible tires, get 1 for $1* *Offer Details
buy 3 eligible tires, get 1 for $1*
Offer Valid September 1 – October 31, 2023
*Eligible on select OEM, OEA, and WIN tires only when purchased from and installed by a participating INFINITI Retailer. Other restrictions apply. See Retailer for details. Price and offer availability may vary by model. Taxes and fees additional. No cash value. May not be combined with any other offers. Void where prohibited. Offer ends October 31, 2023. Tires must be installed by November 7, 2023. © 2023 INFINITI
